v-model:show.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

lock-scroll.description: Whether or not to prohibit scroll penetration, when disabled, the scroll mask layer does not cause the body to scroll
lock-scroll.description_zh: 是否禁止滚动穿透，禁止时滚动遮罩层不会引发 body 的滚动

teleport.description: The location where the mask layer is mounted

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the mask layer is clicked
